ID, CM_MEMID, CM_CUSTID, CM_RELATION, CM_NAME, CM_SEX, CM_MOBILE1, CM_EMAIL

C.ID, C.CM_MEMID, C.CM_CUSTID, C.CM_RELATION, C.CM_NAME, C.CM_SEX, C.CM_MOBILE1, C.CM_EMAIL CG.ID CG_ID, CG.NAME CG_NAME,CG.STATUS CG_STATUS, CG.CREATE_DATE CG_CREATE_DATE, CG.CREATE_USER CG_CREATE_USER, CG.NUM1 CG_NUM1, CG.NUM2 CG_NUM2, CG.VC1 CG_VC1, CG.VC2 CG_VC2, CG.CHR1 CG_CHR1, CG.CHR2 CG_CHR2
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM CUSTOMER C LEFT JOIN CGROUP_REL CGR ON CGR.CUSTOMER_ID=C.ID LEFT JOIN CGROUP CG ON CG.ID=CGR.CGROUP_ID where C.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID from CUSTOMER where CM_MOBILE1 = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
